release.action: There is now a common profile for code generation with meta-info like project name, source folder, etc... This common profile thus lets the user customize where and how code is generated. The common profile is handled by both the Java and C++ generators.
[Codegen Java] New Java code generator, profile, and library
[Reverse C++] New C++ to UML reverse plugins
[designer][releng] migrate the feature from extra to designer
